Name: Ableton Live
Description: Ableton makes Push and Live, hardware and software for music production, creation and performance. Ableton´s products are made to inspire creative music-making.

Name: Avid Pro Tools
Description: Music software for Mac or Windows to create audio with up to 128 audio tracks. Pro Tools includes 60 virtual instruments (thousands of sounds), effects, sound processing, utility plugins, 1 GB of cloud storage and 75 individual plugins. Create, Collaborate. Be heard.

Name: Presonus Studio One
Description: Record, produce, mix, master, and perform all from a single, intuitive application. Designed with ease of use at its core, Studio One® 5 is your creative partner from studio to stage.

Name: Cockos Reaper
Description: REAPER is a complete digital audio production application for computers, offering a full multitrack audio and MIDI recording, editing, processing, mixing and mastering toolset.

Name: Apple Logic Pro
Description: Logic Pro is a complete professional recording studio on the Mac. And it has everything musicians need to go from first note to final master.

Name: Apple GarageBand
Description: ‎Read reviews, compare customer ratings, see screenshots, and learn more about GarageBand. Download GarageBand for macOS 11.0 or later and enjoy it on your Mac.

Name: Reason
Description: Reason is a powerful collection of virtual instruments, effects and music production tools where musical ideas and amazing sounds comes to life. Available as a VST plugin or in Reason standalone.

Name: FL Studio
Description: FL Studio, an all-in-one music production software, is one of the world's most popular DAW. Download your free trial today.

Name: Steinberg Cubase
Description: Whether you want to start creating your own music or bring your production up to a professional level, Cubase guides you on your music production journey.

Name: Steinberg Nuendo
Description: As the most advanced audio post-production solution available, Nuendo is the choice of film, TV, game audio and immersive sound industry professionals worldwide

Name: Mixcraft
Description: The Easiest Music Recording Software For Musicians. Stay In The Creative Zone.

Name: Bandlab Cakewalk
Description: The cloud platform where musicians and fans create music, collaborate and engage with each other across the globe.

Name: LMMS
Description: LMMS is a free, open source, multiplatform digital audio workstation.

Name: Ardour
Description: The open source cross-platform DAW. Record, Edit, and Mix on Linux, macOS and Windows.

Name: Adobe Audition
Description: Edit, mix, record, and restore audio. Audition is a comprehensive toolset that includes multitrack, waveform, and spectral display for creating, mixing, editing, and restoring audio content. This powerful audio workstation is designed to accelerate video production workflows and audio finishing — and deliver a polished mix with pristine sound.

Name: N-Track Studio
Description:
Audio and music recording, editing and mixing software for Windows, Mac, 
iOS and Android. Record your music easily from your computer or smartphone.

Name: MOTU DP
Description:
Get inspired, then refine your mix — all in a singular workflow. Digital 
Performer 10 delivers inspirational features devised to ignite your creative muse, combined with state-of-the-art studio production technologies engineered for the most demanding, world-class recording and production environments.

Name: Tracktion Waveform
Description: The most creative, inspirational, and affordable digital audio workstation ever created. Waveform is laser focused on music production.

Name: Facebook 360
Description: A free software suite for designing spatial audio for 360 video and cinematic VR

Name: Komplete
Description: VST package

Name: Komplete Players
Description: Step into music production with KOMPLETE START – a curated selection of studio-quality instruments, effects, utilities, loops, and samples for the low price of nothing at all. Play over 2,000 customizable sounds – drums and percussion, bass, acoustic instruments, synths, pads and atmospheres, effects, and more. And did we mention it’s free?

Name: Kontakt 6
Description: VST package

Name: Guitar Rig 5
Description: GUITAR RIG 6 PLAYER is a free amp simulator and effects rack, with a range of high-class modular components for warming up sounds.

Name: Yamaha VCS-5
Description: VST yamaha soft synth emulation

Name: Reverb
Description: Discover Computer Music on Reverb. Find the best DAWs, VSTs, Plugins, and Presets and learn how to use them.

Name: VST4Free
Description: Free audio plugins archive - Instruments and effects for audio software. Plugins for Cubase, FL studio, Reaper, Ableton and other VST/AU platforms.

Name: Audacity
Description: Audacity® is free, open source, cross-platform audio software for multi-track recording and editing.

Name: ocenaudio
Description: The ocenaudio is a cross-platform audio editor, easy to use, fast and functional.

Name: Magix Sound Forge Pro
Description: SOUND FORGE Pro 14 sets the benchmark for professional audio recording and editing at the highest level.

Name: Magix Sound Forge Music Studio
Description:
Recording, editing, restoration and mastering: SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 
offers everything for easily editing your audio files.

Name: MAGIX Acid Pro
Description: When inspiration meets creativity: ACID Pro 10 is for all those who seek flexible sample based music production!

Name: MAGIX Acid Music Studio
Description: Build your own beats | With over 2,500 Loops | For hip-hop, rock and tons more | Includes 8 virtual instruments | Bonus: Special remixing tools

Name: MAGIX Music Maker
Description: Combine sounds & loops, play melodies with software instruments, record vocals and rap and drag & drop to apply effects.

Name: Audiotool
Description: Make your own songs in the online studio app and publish them on the audiotool platform or listen to free music produced by the audiotool artists.

Name: Soundation
Description: Make music in your browser and collaborate with anyone on Soundation, a one-stop shop for audio samples, instruments, and effects.

Name: Soundtrap
Description: Music making, audio editing, loops, autotune, beat maker, all you need to create music free. It's online and collaborative - sign up for your free account now!

Name: Splice
Description: Splice is the leading platform for music production offering access to millions of the best royalty-free samples, loops, and presets; Rent-to-Own plugins & DAWs.

Name: Ecrett Music
Description: Easy way to create royalty free music.

Name: imitone
Description: Voice to MIDI, also available as a VST Plugin

Name: Renoise
Description: Renoise is a digital audio workstation. It lets you compose, edit and record production-quality audio using a music tracker-based approach. It features a wide range of built-in audio processors, alongside support for all commonly used virtual instrument and effect plug-in formats.

Name: DefleMask
Description: DefleMask is a cross-platform chiptune music tracker. You can produce video game music for many soundchips and old school game-consoles and computers.

Name: OpenMPT
Description: OpenMPT (Open ModPlug Tracker) is a popular step sequencer supporting many tracker module formats. Clone of Impulse Tracker, FastTracker, Scream Tracker and ProTracker.

Name: Psycle
Description: Download Psycle Modular Music Creation Studio for free. Psycle is a Music tracker (like FastTracker 2 or Impulse Tracker) combined with plugin modularity. It supports its own plugin API, the VST2 plugin standard, and a tracker style sampler playback. FastTracker II  Clone, ProTracker Clone

Name: Milky Tracker
Description: FastTracker II Clone, ProTracker Clone

Name: 16-bits FT2
Description: FastTracker II  Clone

Name: 16-bits PT
Description: ProTracker Clone

Name: Schism Tracker
Description: Impulse Tracker Clone

Name: MadTracker
Description: MadTracker is the music composition tool that creates the shortest path between imagination and music. Based on the tracker concept, MadTracker provides a clean and intuitive interface for a powerful and efficient approach on making music. Versatility and compatibility are guaranteed due to full VST and ReWire support, while its computer charge is minimal.

Name: Klystrack
Description: klystrack is a tracker for making C64/NES/Amiga-style chiptunes on a modern platform.

Name: Bosca Ceoil
Description: A free, easy to use tool for creating music!

Name: FamiTracker
Description: FamiTracker is a free windows tracker for producing music for the NES/Famicom-systems.

Name: VCV Rack
Description: VCV Rack - the Eurorack simulator. Free download

Name: Tracktion Waverazor
Description: Waverazor 2.0 Editor Version is a futuristic synth that gives you the power to splice waveforms into aggressive new sounds. AU/VST/AAX on Mac, PC, and Linux.

Name: SunVox
Description: SunVox is a small, fast and powerful modular synthesizer with pattern-based sequencer (tracker). It is a tool for those people who like to compose music wherever they are, whenever they wish. On any device. On any system.

Name: AudioSauna
Description: AudioSauna transforms your web browser into a fast and flexible music production studio with built in synthesizers and live effects. Also available as a Google Chrome Plugin

Name: ZynAddSubFX
Description: ZynAddSubFX is a fully featured open source software synthesizer capable of making a countless number of instruments, from some common heard from expensive hardware to interesting sounds that you'll boost to an amazing universe of sounds.

Name: Traktor
Description: Professional, award-winning DJ software with a wealth of powerful functions and creative features – customizable to any DJ setup.

Name: Mixxx
Description: Download the most advanced FREE DJ software available, featuring iTunes integration, MIDI controller support, internet broadcasting, and integrated music library.

Name: djay
Description: djay - #1 DJ app for iPad, iPhone, and Android. djay Pro - professional DJ software for Mac and Windows.

Name: Deckadance
Description: Deckadance 2 can run VST compliant effects and/or softsynths for producing unique mind blowing musical performances and can also be controlled with MIDI controllers, timecoded vinyl and CD systems.

Name: Serato DJ
Description: World Leading DJ Software, used by millions of DJs worldwide.

Name: Cross DJ
Description: Downloaded by millions and developed by the creators of Rekordbox. Get Cross DJ 4, the upgraded DJ experience, on macOS and Windows.

Name: Giada
Description: Giada is an open source, minimalistic and hardcore music production tool. Designed for DJs, live performers and electronic musicians.undefined

Name: BeepBox
Description: BeepBox is an online tool for sketching and sharing instrumental melodies.

Name: Bfxr
Description: Sound-effects generation for your games in flash. Expands upon sfxr.

Name: Jsfxr
Description: HTML5 port of Sfxr

Name: Sfxr
Description: Sound Effects generator made to support entrants during the 10th Ludum Dare

Name: ChipTone
Description: ChipTone is a free tool for generating sound effects, primarily for games but they could be used for anything you like!

Name: Leshy SF Designer
Description: Leshy SFMaker is a retro-style sound effect generator. It can be used to quickly generate sounds for games and other applications.

Name: LabChirp
Description: Download LabChirp - A free sound effects generator with multiple channels, modulation, envelopes, custom waveforms, effects, randomizer, mutator and more.

Name: Footsteps Generator
Description: Footstep SFX generator that can be used for non-commercial or private use, or for commercial use if sounds are purchased.

Name: Krotos
Description: Creative Sound Design & Music Solutions. Our mission is to improve the way sound is designed and performed. Krotos software allows you to perform and customise sound easily, saving you hours of editing time and allowing you to focus on creativity while injecting more fun into the process.

Name: SynthFont
Description: SynthFont, Viena, VSTSynthFont and SyFonOne are the four main tools provided here for playing with MIDI files and SoundFonts, SynthFont lets you also edit MIDI files while Viena lets you edit SoundFonts. Use SynthFont to create audio files for playback on other devices.

Name: MultitrackStudio
Description: MultitrackStudio is audio/MIDI multitrack recording software for both home recording, one track at a time, and live multitrack recording.

Name: Anvil Studio
Description: Free Windows multi-track MIDI/Audio recording & editing, VST Effects & Instruments, automation. Options for Sheet Music printing, music theory, ear training.

Name: Rose Garden
Description: Rosegarden is a powerful audio, MIDI and score editing and sequencing environment for musicians.

Name: Viena
Description: Viena news. All about the latest release.

Name: Polyphone
Description: Polyphone is a free and open-source software for editing sf2, sf3, sfArk and sfz soundfonts. A clean interface and convenient tools have been implemented to efficiently deal with small or big instruments. Polyphone is available in different languages for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and comes with a forum and a detailed documentation.

Name: Scala
Description: Scala is a powerful software tool for experimentation with musical tunings, such as just intonation scales, equal and historical temperaments, microtonal and macrotonal scales, and non-Western scales.

Name: Finale
Description: Produce the music of your imagination without compromise. No other music notation software offers Finale’s level of control, letting you decide both what and how you create. At every rehearsal, know that your score will sound great, your parts are ready, and you have clearly communicated your musical vision.

Name: Forte
Description: With FORTE 12 music notation software, you can write sheet music using your computer in minutes, have it played back by over 100 preloaded instruments at the click of a button

Name: MuseScore
Description: Create, play back and print beautiful sheet music with free and easy to use music notation software MuseScore.

Name: Lilypond
Description: LilyPond – Music notation for everyone

Name: Denemo
Description: Denemo uses LilyPond which generates beautiful sheet music to the highest publishing standards. During input Denemo displays the staffs in a simple fashion, so you can enter and edit the music efficiently.

Name: Avid Sibelius
Description: Music Notation software used by great composers, arrangers, publishers and educators. Use Sibelius to compose rich scores with the core tools you need to create and share professional scores easily.

Name: Steinberg Dorico
Description: Compose or publish music notation, produce teaching materials or learn the language of music — Dorico lets you make beautiful music, fast.

Name: Presonus Notion
Description: Bring musical inspirations to life with the blazingly fast and intuitive Notion™ 6 music composition and performance environment. Compose when and how you want and even enter music with your own handwriting.

Name: Magic Score
Description: MagicScore - easy and powerful music notation and composition software

Name: ScoreCloud
Description: Like Google Translate for music! ScoreCloud music notation software instantly turns your songs into sheet music. As simple as that! - Music writing software. Includes Cloud Save.

Name: Musink
Description: Musink is free music-composition software that will change the way you write music. Notate scores, books, MIDI files, exercises &amp sheet music easily &amp quickly

Name: Noteflight
Description: Noteflight is an online music writing application that lets you create, view, print and hear professional quality music notation right in your web browser.

Name: NoteWorthy Composer
Description: Music notation software for Windows computers.

Name: Overture
Description: Overture 5, the world's most innovative music notation software has a clean, powerful, easy to use interface. It's robust impressive features give you the best program for creating music scores. Overture 5 is a clear choice at half the price and twice the value.

Name: Capella
Description: capella-software. All you need around music notation. Write • Scan • Compose • Practice • Learn
